metadata.title: CVE-2012-0318 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Movable Type before4.38, 5.0x before 5.07, and 5.1x before 5.13 allow remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving templates, adifferent issue than CVE-2012-1262.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0318` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-zemanta - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
